extension.summary: Clean up temporary files in Kodi.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991
extension.description: Clean up temporary files in Kodi.

extension.summary: Test your Internet bandwidth
extension.description:
This add-on tests your Internet bandwith and reports both download and upload speeds and latency from within Kodi.
Use this if you are experiencing streaming issues and you suspect your network to be the cause.
extension.disclaimer: Speed Tester is powered by speedtest.net
